UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the Desaf√≠o HV app.

email.description: The email address of the user.

level.description: The user's current level in the app.

goldLingots.description: The number of gold lingots the user has.

casinoChips.description: The number of casino chips the user has.

imageUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

StudySession.title: StudySession
StudySession.description: Represents a study session recorded by a user.

subject.description: The subject of the study session.

startTime.description: The start time of the study session.

endTime.description: The end time of the study session.

durationMinutes.description: The duration of the study session in minutes.

Exercise.title: Exercise
Exercise.description: Represents an exercise or activity for personal development.

category.description: The category of the exercise (e.g., mindfulness, productivity).

UserExercise.title: UserExercise
UserExercise.description: Represents a user's completion of an exercise.

completionDate.description: The date the user completed the exercise.

notes.description: Optional notes from the user about the exercise.

StoreItem.title: StoreItem
StoreItem.description: Represents an item available for purchase in the virtual store.

price.description: The price of the item in gold lingots.

UserItem.title: UserItem
UserItem.description: Represents an item owned by a user.

purchaseDate.description: The date the item was purchased.

HvPass.title: HvPass
HvPass.description: Represents the HV Pass subscription for a user.

startDate.description: The start date of the HV Pass subscription.

endDate.description: The end date of the HV Pass subscription.

active.description: Indicates whether the HV Pass is currently active.

gameType.description: The type of casino game played.

betAmount.description: The amount of casino chips bet.

winAmount.description: The amount of casino chips won.

gameDate.description: The date and time the game was played.

Ranking.title: Ranking
Ranking.description: Represents a user's ranking in the global leaderboard.

rank.description: The user's current rank in the leaderboard.

score.description: The user's score used for ranking.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time the ranking was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. The 'userId' parameter is the Firebase Authentication UID.

/users/{userId}/studySessions/{studySess.description: Stores study session data for a specific user.

/exercises/{exerciseId}.description: Stores a list of available exercises.

/users/{userId}/userExercises/{userExerc.description: Stores information about a user's completion of an exercise.

/storeItems/{storeItemId}.description: Stores a list of available store items.

/users/{userId}/userItems/{userItemId}.description: Stores information about items owned by a user.

/users/{userId}/hvPass.description: Stores HV Pass subscription information for a user.

/users/{userId}/casinoGames/{casinoGameI.description: Stores casino game history for a user.
